titleStmt.title: Gallant news of late I bring, tidings of chusing now a King, whereby true subjects may rejoice in chusing them so sweet a choyce that love and peace may so agree, to end the days of misery, To the tune of, Royal news, royal news.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half sheet contains: "The second Part to the same Tune."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
